alert.note: Alert for Baxter; Boone County Except Southwest; Boone County Higher Elevations; Eastern, Central, and Southern Searcy County Higher Elevations; Johnson County Higher Elevations; Marion; Newton County Higher Elevations; Newton County Lower Elevations; Northwest Searcy County Higher Elevations; Pope County Higher Elevations; Searcy County Lower Elevations; Southern Johnson County; Southern and Eastern Logan County; Western and Northern Logan County (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 12 at 2:34AM CST until January 12 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THIS MORNING TO NOON CST TODAY... * WHAT: Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of a dusting up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE: Portions of northwest and northern Arkansas. * WHEN: From 6 AM this morning to noon CST today. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS: Snow and blowing snow could create hazardous travel conditions this morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Be sure to check road conditions before traveling in these areas. Visit the Arkansas Department of Transportation`s website Idrivearkansas.com for the latest road and traffic conditions.
